title: The Adventures of Oscar Yang: Consultant Hero
summary: Oscar Yang uses his consulting skills to uncover and thwart a corporate espionage scheme, protecting the community and reinstating peace over a week.
summaryGerman: Oscar Yang nutzt seine Beratungsfähigkeiten, um ein Unternehmensspionageschema aufzudecken und zu vereiteln, schützt die Gemeinschaft und stellt innerhalb einer Woche wieder Frieden her.
summaryDutch: Oscar Yang gebruikt zijn adviesvaardigheden om een bedrijfsspionageschema te ontmaskeren en te dwarsbomen, beschermt de gemeenschap en herstelt de vrede in een week.
summaryFrench: Oscar Yang utilise ses compétences de conseil pour découvrir et déjouer un stratagème d'espionnage d'entreprise, protégeant la communauté et rétablissant la paix dans le laps d'une semaine.

story.text: Oscar Yang begins his week reviewing client portfolios, unaware that he'll soon stumble upon suspicious financial irregularities hinting at corporate espionage.
Digging deeper into the anomalies, Oscar experiences unease as he realizes the extent of the looming threat. He decides to investigate further.
Oscar contacts an old friend who works in cybersecurity to gather more information. Together, they find evidence of an internal leak.
Armed with proof, Oscar confronts the suspected company insiders. His well-crafted arguments and evidence create tension but produce candid confessions.
In the aftermath, Oscar advises the company on tightened security protocols and better practices, earning respect and gratitude from the board.
Taking a well-deserved break, Oscar spends the day with loved ones, reflecting on the week's tumultuous events and the lives he's impacted.
Oscar prepares for the upcoming week but remains vigilant, knowing the world of corporate consulting always holds new challenges.

ending: With a keen eye and a heart for justice, Oscar Yang proves that even the unlikeliest heroes can protect their communities.
moral: Expertise and vigilance can safeguard the greater good.
